attributes.action: Verification on social media for all users
attributes.additional_details: This is not a petition to silence people’s opinions, however it is a petition for every user of social media platforms to be verified like a person of media interest is. This is not an exercise to silence opinion, but to use as a buffer to unknown user profiles sharing absusive, hate speech towards religion/race/sexual orientation and violent threats towards users. I believe this would cut the amount of abuse aimed at people on social media that can have detrimental impacts to their wellbeing.
attributes.background: It is becoming more and more alarming the amount of comments on social media that are contributing to mental health problems. I ask for verification for all social platforms so users have to provide identification to use.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331573
